channel.title: example on Rants, opinions and tall tales.
channel.description: Recent content in example on Rants, opinions and tall tales.

item.title: eBPF BCC patches
item.description: As I promised in the preceding post I was going to provide patches to BCC for sockmap support. Ta-da! Patches are here and I've also added a BCC version of the example code.

item.title: eBPF and the sockmap API
item.description: Recently I read an older post by the Cloudflare engineering team on using sockmap for TCP splicing (here). Intrigued by the potential of some serious entertainment and curious about the complex tooling I decide to wet my beak in this new area.
